feed.title: OpnForm Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: Fix Icon bug
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ESC-365] = on fetch submission data display error if there by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/608

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.4.1...v1.4.2

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.4.3 Fix matrix + bump client dep
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Right to left mode by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/611
  • Matrix Improvements by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/606

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.4.2...v1.4.3

entry.content:

Another attempt at fixing icon issues.

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.4.5 Scan for all project icons
New release for OpnForm: v1.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix template page breadcrumb ui by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/623
  • fix disabled input dark mode by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/622
  • improve RTL mode by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/625
  • [ESC-388] Fix phoneinput inputval watcher by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/631
  • fix error display modal by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/632
  • Support for Rich Text Input by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/630
  • fix subscription success page by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/636
  • Form Translation by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/616
  • ESC 399 - Enhance redirect URL handling and MentionParser functionality by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/639
  • Send mobile editor email by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/634
  • Update Docker Compose commands in page documenting Docker Compose deployment by @rl1987 in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/644
  • ESC-406 Fix Mention Extension for Quill by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/648
  • Implement regex validation conditions in form logic by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/645
  • ESC-409 image-block-does-not-align by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/651
  • Improve Integration Cards by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/643
  • Email spam security by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/641
  • Add reCAPTCHA support and update captcha provider handling by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/647
  • ESC-417-date-input-is-not-showing-in-google-sheet by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/653
  • Evaluate custom validation rules first by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/655
  • On slack,discord add support for Include hidden fields by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/654
  • Readonly User by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/637
  • Embed form flickering bug by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/658
  • Support for Barcode reader by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/650
  • Form editor logic copy to x by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/656
  • Refactor form components by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/659
  • fix mobile editor email by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/660
  • improve s3key exception by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/661
  • Enhance Form Submission Export Functionality by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/657
  • Fix Submissions Export by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/663
  • Set char limit on rich text by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/662

New Contributors

  • @rl1987 made their first contribution in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/644

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.4.5...v1.5
